Package airtrafficcontrol.app.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DatabaseNotFoundException
    Thrown when a method tries to reach a null or inexistent flights' database.
    FlightNotFoundInDatabaseException
    Thrown when a method tries to reach a flight in a flights' database that doesn't contain it.
    InvalidArgumentException
    Exception thrown when it was received an invalid argument.
    InvalidFlightIDException
    Exception thrown when it was received an invalid flightID.
    InvalidOptionException
    Exception thrown when it was received an instance of Option that is invalid in the context of the operation being executed.
    InvalidOptionNumberException
    Exception thrown when it was received an invalid number of option (that is not between 1 and the number of the last option in an OptionsMenu) in an operation which involves only the numbers of the options available in a certain OptionsMenu.
